Mukadame ke anusaar, sanyukt rashtra ke shivir se nikalane vaale kachare ko achchi tarah se saaf nahin kiya gaya tha, jis karan bacteria Haiti ke sab se badi,  Artibonite nadi ki sahayak nadi mein pravesh kar gaya. Tukadiyon ke pahunchane se pehle, 1800 ke dashak se haiti ka kabhi-bhi beemariyon se judi samasyaon se saamana nahin hua tha. Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy ne swatantra adhyayanon ka hawala dete hue sujhaav diya hai ki nepali sanyukt rashtra shanti raksha batalian anajaane mein haiti mein bimari lekar aayi hai. is bimari par sanyukt rashtra ke visheshagya  Danielle Lantagne ne kahaa ki iska prakop ka karan shanti rakhane vaale hain.

choices.B: Sainikon ke aane se kuch der pehle

Passage: "MRI ek bhautiki ghatna par adharit hai jise parmanu chumbakiya anunaad (NMR)  jata hai, jiski khoj 1930 ke dashak mein felix baloch (stanford vishvavidyalaya mein karyarat) aur Edward Parsel (Harvard vishvavidyalaya) ne ki thi. Is anunaad mein, chumbakiya kshetra aur radio tarangen parmaanuon ko chhote radio sanketon ko chhodne ka karan bante hain. Saal 1970 mein, medical doctor aur anusandhaan vaigyaanik Raymond Damadian ne chikitsa nidan ke liye ek upkaran ke roop mein chumbakiya anunaad imaging ka istemal karne ke liye aadhar ki khoj ki. Chaar saal baad koi patent diya gaya. yah meri ke kshetra mein jaari kiya gaya duniya ka pahala patent tha. 1977 mein, Dr. Damadian ne sabse pehle ""pure shareer par"" MRI scanner ke sanrachana ka nirmaan kiya, jise unhone ""adamya"" naam diya."

Samanya taur par, kisi bhi videshi desh mein samay avadhi ke baad bahut samay tak rahne ke liye aapko pehle hi visa praapt karne ki aavashyakta hogi. Chhaatr visa mein aam taur par ek samanya paryatak yaa vyaavsaayik visa se alag zarooratein aur aavedan prakriyaaen hoti hain. Adhikansh deshon ke liye, aapko us sansthan se ek prastaav patra ki aavashyakta hogi, jahan par aap adhyayan karna chahte hai aur course ke pehle varsh mein khud ke kharche ke liye dhan ka saboot bhi. Iske atirikta, aisaa karne mein asafal hone ke gambhir parinam hote hain: avasaad banaan, kuposhan aur antatah mrityu. Paudhonse sabse aasaanise milane vaale sansadhanon mein pattiyon aur faliyon mein milane vaale protein hote, lekin hum jaise primates ke liye use pakaye binaa pachaana mushkil hota hai. iske vipreet, pashu khaadya padaarth (chintiyan, deemak, andey) naan kewal aasaani se pachane yogya hote hain, balki way uchch matra mein protein pradhan karte hain jismein sabhi zaruri amino acid hote hain. Agar hamare apne poorvajon ne apni ""protein ki samasya"" ko kuch hadd tak usi tarah sulajhaaya, toh hamein aashcharyachakit nahin hona chaahiye, jaise ki aaj ke samay mein chimpaji karte hain."

Is anunaad mein, chumbakiya kshetra aur radio tarangen parmaanuon ko chhote radio sanketon ko chhodne ka karan bante hain. Saal 1970 mein, medical doctor aur anusandhaan vaigyaanik Raymond Damadian ne chikitsa nidan ke liye ek upkaran ke roop mein chumbakiya anunaad imaging ka istemal karne ke liye aadhar ki khoj ki. Chaar saal baad koi patent diya gaya. yah meri ke kshetra mein jaari kiya gaya duniya ka pahala patent tha. 1977 mein, Dr. Damadian ne sabse pehle ""pure shareer par"" MRI scanner ke sanrachana ka nirmaan kiya, jise unhone ""adamya"" naam diya."

Surya ke samne waale shukra (yaa chandrama) ke chamakdaar hisse ke karan hi kalaayen ghatati-badhati hain. shukra kalaayen copernicus ke is siddhant ka samarthan karti hain ki grah surya ke parikrama karte hain. Dou maal ka maanana hai ki kuch rogiyon ka aspatal mein hi sankraman hua hoga, aur in mein kamse kam do aspatal swaasthya karyakarta the. ek saal ke dauran, ek sankramit vyakti 10se 15 karibi samparkon ko sankramit kar sakta hai. Haalaanki, tuberculosis vaale logon ke poore samooh mein xdr-tb ka pratishat abhi bhi kam hai; dakshin africa mein kisi bhi vishesh samay par cull 330,000 logon mein se 6,000 sankramit hain."
